content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This module provides helpful new hire information.  Access is provided prior to your start date for your convenience, but review is voluntary, and all content will remain available after you begin your employment. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At EPAM we promote \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"'Thank You' culture\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - a culture of expressing gratitude and appreciation. In such a way we recognize all the small and big wins of our teammates. A simple ‘thank you’ can make our day-to-day life more pleasant and joyful, give us the strength to move further and achieve even greater results.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Saying 'thank you' certainly matters to the person you say it to, but it can have great rewards for you too. Sure, you can go a long way without it, but you will achieve a lot more with it! \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":89654,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e3dbe0ab-278e-4290-b4f2-7f5f221ef86c/rec1.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e3dbe0ab-278e-4290-b4f2-7f5f221ef86c/rec1.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"rec1.png\",\"name\":\"rec1.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"e3dbe0ab-278e-4290-b4f2-7f5f221ef86c\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":769,\"height\":379},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Heroes Portal\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Heroes Portal\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is our main tool for public recognition.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At EPAM, we believe that everyone deserves to be a hero. Each time you catch a colleague doing cool things, going the extra mile or just showing a great attitude, make sure they know you notice and appreciate this.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rAt EPAM, it is easy to say ‘Thank You’ and recognize your colleagues with their achievements or professional holidays regardless of the time zone or location you live in. Heroes Portal is at your service 24/7, EPAM-wide.\\r \\rAll EPAMers’ achievements are public on the Heroes wall. You can customize it in order to see badges that were assigned only for your project/location/unit.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Superheroes \\r\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Here at EPAM we want to ensure that our team is proud of the contributions made to the overall EPAM organisation. To do this we want to demonstrate best practice in living up to our values.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We have 5 awards for each of our values. If you have seen one of your colleagues demonstrate the below you can use the Heroes portal to nominate them for a Superheroes award using the specially designated badges within the Heroes portal:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":236750,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/6d25dd08-2338-4a78-b414-dd381db22b3d/super1.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/6d25dd08-2338-4a78-b414-dd381db22b3d/super1.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"super1.png\",\"name\":\"super1.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"6d25dd08-2338-4a78-b414-dd381db22b3d\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":968,\"height\":423},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":248027,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/8f771162-10c6-407a-a632-efbe6d4734e0/super2.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/8f771162-10c6-407a-a632-efbe6d4734e0/super2.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"super2.png\",\"name\":\"super2.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"8f771162-10c6-407a-a632-efbe6d4734e0\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":980,\"height\":473},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":127472,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b15bef46-d3ac-4144-b4e3-c50525807691/super3.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b15bef46-d3ac-4144-b4e3-c50525807691/super3.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"super3.png\",\"name\":\"super3.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"b15bef46-d3ac-4144-b4e3-c50525807691\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":526,\"height\":483},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A panel of previous winners will review the nominations regularly and “pass on the crown” to the next winners, with a number of exciting and cool prizes up for grabs.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You don’t need to spend time looking for something extraordinary – it’s important to say ‘thank you’ now.\\r \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r And remember that we are making EPAM an outstanding workplace by showing appreciation to our colleagues!\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":82891,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d5c83f8d-97fe-4c2a-982f-9b98ac749e27/rec5png.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d5c83f8d-97fe-4c2a-982f-9b98ac749e27/rec5png.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"rec5png.png\",\"name\":\"rec5png.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"d5c83f8d-97fe-4c2a-982f-9b98ac749e27\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":576,\"height\":397},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]}]}}"
